title: Star Guardian Release Date Question
body: Will the Star Guardian Skins be released today or tomorrow? I'm super ready to get them I was just wondering since I'm seeing people say that it will be released during the event, and others say this patch.

replies.body:
Heyo!

So the post below me kinda hits the nail on the head.  We haven't released a specific date just yet for when the skins will be released, but it should happen during this patch!  We often don't release specific dates because sometimes some skins require a last minute bit of polish before we release them live. This may cause it to get delayed by a few days and we don't want to ruin any expectations.

For now, just sit tight! You'll know when they are available from checking the League website or checking back on the store!  Is there any particular skin your hoping to grab in particular?  :)
i'm already pretty hyped for _star guardian soraka_ {{champion:16}} :D
Oh I'm getting all of the new skins, lol I love them all so I'm just trying to keep calm and not use up any RP so that I have enough. Will there be a bundle?
Hopefully!  Keep your eyes peeled on the store so you don't miss anything! ^.^

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3LVN30Zo,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-08-25T00:31:14.136+0000)
>
> Hopefully!  Keep your eyes peeled on the store so you don't miss anything! ^.^

According to Katey Chaos' twitter, the skins will release at the start of the event. So we won't see anything until September 7th.

The event is in this patch. 7.18 pbe cycle will last 3 weeks meaning that 7.17 will remain live in our servers for 3 weeks.
Now a lot of people are saying they will be released with the new game mode the 7 september and that's very likely going to happen.
That said i still have to see an official post from riot and until i see it i will keep thinking they may come out tomorrow after the end of the arcade event or next week who knows

p.s. i really hope to see them tomorrow, been waiting for them for months
Everyone's said September 7th, which I hope isn't true since that's two weeks to wait. :(
